part.Name: Description
part.Short: Ascomata rise in swaying spires from furrowed skin, sampling open air. Prospective descendance is arrayed in spores, poised to take over decomissioned synapses.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gas-caught foam was stiffened into a membrane of rubber seals, forming a portable sanctuary of tepid air. The muffled world awaits beyond marble polymer, dust and spores breaking against the polymer shores.
